StringTable.Label: DesertWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Excellent for manufacturing, but difficult to farm.

StringTable.Label: ActiveCore_Dec
StringTable.String: Abundant Geothermal energy, but dangerous to the population.

StringTable.Label: GhostWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Abandoned world, full of strange new artifacts to study.

StringTable.Label: SereneWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: The type of planet we all want to retire to.

StringTable.Label: BountifulWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world full of valuable and rare resources.

StringTable.Label: BreadBasketWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: The perfect world to grow food and population.

StringTable.Label: TidallyLockedWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world with one large moon which is helpful to traders and manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: ShieldedWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Heavily shielded by a dense Magnetic field, very helpful to research and defense.

StringTable.Label: ThinAtmosphereWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Great for growing food, but not so great at growing people.

StringTable.Label: ShroudedWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A world surround by a dust cloud, helpful in defense but very isolating to the population.

StringTable.Label: LowGravityWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Low Gravity, helpful to manufacturing, and tourists love it.

StringTable.Label: ScenicWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: All other planets are ugly by comparison.

StringTable.Label: AquaticWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A massive ocean doesn't leave enough land for standard colonization.

StringTable.Label: CorrosiveWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Acidic lakes and storms makes this world unsuitable for colonization by non-carbon lifeforms.

StringTable.Label: BacterialWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A wide range of agressive and lethal bacteria make this world unsuitable for standard colonization.

StringTable.Label: FrozenWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Temperatures are too low for standard colonization .

StringTable.Label: BarrenWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Lack of any biomass makes standard colonization impossible.

StringTable.Label: ToxicWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Atmosphere is too toxic to support standard colonization.

StringTable.Label: RadioactiveWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Radiation Levels are too high for standard colonization.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorShielded_Dec
StringTable.String: Locked behind an Impenetrable Precursor Shield.
